openGraph.title: Roulette Picker
openGraph.description: Drop in your options and spin to get an instant random result. Perfect for quick team picks, menu decisions, or brainstorming choices.

title: Roulette Picker
description: Enter options and spin the roulette to draw a random result fast.

placeholder.items: Enter one item per line or separate with commas.

helper.needMore: Add at least 2 items to spin.
helper.separator: Use line breaks or commas to separate items.
